newsitem.title: HONG KONG: New World studies property spin-off plan.
newsitem.headline: New World studies property spin-off plan.

text.p: New World Development Co Ltd said on Friday it was studying the feasibility of spinning off its businesses, including property, in Hong Kong.

"The company is studying the possibility, with its advisers, of a reorganisation and a separate listing on the Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Ltd of the company's interest in certain service and property related businesses," New World said in a statement.
The company said "the proposed reorganisation and separate listing are still at discussion stage and may or may not actually proceed".
New World gave no further details but said a statement would be issued once a decision was made.
